title: Fix 7 failing tests caused by Technician MOM 55→58
description: COMPLETED Round 2: QA fixed 18 test failures across 4 files (7 from Technician MOM + 11 from Charger INIT/STA). Rewrote match.test.ts worked example (now 2-pass unseat). Added 16 new tests. 605/605 passing.

title: Fix Technician weakness at Epic/Giga tiers
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Technician MOM 55→58. Win rates improved: bare +3.1pp (48.7%), epic +0.9pp (46.4%), giga +2.1pp (48.3%). All above 45% target.

title: Investigate Charger weakness at bare tier
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Charger INIT 60→55, STA 60→65. Bare win rate 35.9%→41-42% (+5-6pp). Target ≥40% met. Spread tightened from 26.5pp to ~19pp.

title: Assess breakerGuardPenetration effectiveness
description: COMPLETED Round 3: breakerGuardPenetration 0.20→0.25. Breaker overall +2-3pp across most tiers (bare 48.2%, epic 52.2%, giga 54.8%). No test failures — constant is NOT test-locked. Bulwark dominance assessed: GRD=65 double-dip is root cause, needs guardImpactCoeff change (test-locked). Full analysis in balance-tuner-round-3.md.

title: Test gear variant interactions with archetype matchups
description: COMPLETED Round 1: QA added 112 new tests (44→156 in gear-variants.test.ts). All variant tests pass.

title: Test softCap boundary behavior
description: COMPLETED Round 2: QA added 6 softCap boundary tests + 10 exploratory edge cases to calculator.test.ts. All passing.

title: Test stamina/fatigue boundary conditions
description: COMPLETED Round 3: QA added 10 fatigue boundary tests (threshold, below-threshold, 1 stamina, negative, guard fatigue interpolation, attack cost clamping, speed clamping). 647/647 passing.

title: Polish rarity card styling
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Added per-tier colored hover glow, selected state glow, prefers-reduced-motion support.

title: Improve variant toggle button UX
description: COMPLETED Rounds 1-2: Stance-colored active states, pill group container, hover preview, mobile touch targets.

title: Review balance-config.ts for magic numbers
description: COMPLETED Round 1: All balance-tunable constants centralized. See analysis/review-round-1.md.

title: Type safety audit of gear system
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Full audit — no 'any', no 'as' casts, exhaustive slot mappings. See analysis/reviewer-round-2.md.

title: Full tier sweep — run sims at all 7 tiers and document
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Full 7-tier sweep documented in balance-tuner-round-3.md. Balance improves monotonically with tier (18.5pp bare → 4.1pp giga). Bulwark dominance peaks at uncommon (63.6%). Charger strongest at epic (56.0%). Legendary/relic/giga excellent (<6pp spread).

title: Test breaker guard penetration mechanic
description: COMPLETED Round 3: QA added 4 penetration tests — positive benefit vs all 6 archetypes, exact 20% removal verified, melee penetration verified, non-breaker zero penetration verified. 647/647 passing.

title: Polish combat result display
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Added badge-appear animation, crit-glow pulse, unseat-entrance animation. prefers-reduced-motion support included.

title: Review round 1 code changes for quality
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Reviewed balance-tuner's Technician MOM change (clean), QA's 112 new tests (sound design), polish's CSS (no engine impact). Fixed stale CounterResult comment in types.ts. See analysis/reviewer-round-2.md.

title: Remove inline styles from LoadoutScreen variant toggle
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Polish agent removed VARIANT_COLORS constant and inline style={...} from LoadoutScreen.tsx variant toggle buttons. CSS stance tokens now fully control colors.

title: Review round 2 code changes for quality
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Reviewed Charger INIT/STA swap (clean), QA's 18 test fixes + 16 new tests (correct), match worked example rewrite (correct 2-pass unseat). Fixed stale comment in balance-config.ts:22. APPROVED with no blocks. See review-round-3.md.

title: Polish melee transition and winner banner
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Added melee transition entrance animation (scale + red shadow bloom), winner banner gold glow, draw entrance animation, btn--outline modifier for quick-set buttons. All with prefers-reduced-motion support.

title: Investigate Tactician mirror P1 bias (BUG-002)
description:
BUG-002: Tactician mirror match shows ~36% vs 64% P1 bias in some bare runs. QA downgraded to Low — likely Monte Carlo noise at N=200. Needs N=1000+ to confirm. Add a targeted test to playtest.test.ts: Tactician mirror N=500, verify P1 win rate 40-60%. Do NOT change engine code.

NOTE: QA is all-done. This is deferred to next session or can be picked up if QA is re-activated.

title: Fix Bulwark bare/uncommon dominance — test guardImpactCoeff 0.16
description:
PRIMARY REMAINING BALANCE CONCERN. Bulwark bare=60.4%, uncommon=63.0% (target: <58%). Root cause: GRD=65 double-dips in guardImpactCoeff (impact scoring) AND guardUnseatDivisor (unseat resistance).

Proposed fix: guardImpactCoeff 0.18 → 0.16 in balance-config.ts.

WARNING: This constant is TEST-LOCKED in ~7 test assertions. Coordinate with QA (BL-021) to update tests BEFORE or AFTER the change. Do NOT change the value until QA has a plan for the test cascade.

Steps: 1) Run sims at 0.16 (bare, uncommon, rare, epic, giga) to verify Bulwark drops below 58% without creating new problems. 2) Check if Charger bare stays above 40%. 3) Check Duelist doesn't become dominant (was flagged as risk at 0.16 in Round 2 analysis). 4) If 0.16 works, coordinate with QA on test updates. 5) Write findings to analysis/balance-tuner-round-4.md.

Do NOT apply the change to balance-config.ts yet — just run sims with the modified value and report results. QA needs to prepare test updates first.

title: Prepare test updates for guardImpactCoeff 0.18→0.16
description:
Balance-tuner is evaluating guardImpactCoeff 0.18→0.16 to fix Bulwark dominance (BL-020). This constant is hardcoded in ~7 test assertions.

Tasks: 1) Identify ALL test assertions that reference guardImpactCoeff=0.18 or use 0.18 in computed values (search for '0.18', '*0.18', '* 0.18' in test files). 2) Document each affected assertion with file, line, current value, and what the new value would be at 0.16. 3) Write a test update plan to analysis/qa-round-4.md — do NOT make changes yet, just document what needs to change.

This is a PREPARATORY task — do not modify any test files until balance-tuner confirms 0.16 is the right value (BL-020 must complete first).

title: Review round 3 code changes for quality
description:
Review Round 3 changes: 1) balance-tuner's breakerGuardPenetration 0.20→0.25 in balance-config.ts — already reviewed and APPROVED by reviewer in Round 3, verify no further changes. 2) QA's 42 new tests across calculator.test.ts and playtest.test.ts — verify assertions reference correct values (breakerGuardPenetration now 0.25, not 0.20). 3) Polish's LoadoutScreen.tsx inline style removal + App.css melee/winner polish. 4) Reviewer's own balance-config.ts comment fix. Check for stale docs.

Also: Update CLAUDE.md 'Balance State' section — breakerGuardPenetration is now 0.25 (was 0.20), Charger INIT=55/STA=65 (was INIT=60/STA=60). 647 tests now passing (was 477 at session start). Write findings to analysis/review-round-4.md.

title: Add multi-pass worked example test to match.test.ts
description:
Reviewer flagged that after the match.test.ts rewrite in Round 2, there's no multi-pass (3-5 pass) worked example anymore — the current one ends at Pass 2 with an unseat. This reduces integration coverage of fatigue progression.

Add a new worked example test: Pick two archetypes with moderate stats (e.g., Tactician vs Duelist or Technician vs Tactician) that are likely to go 3-5 passes without unseat at bare. Trace through all passes manually. Include fatigue progression, stamina tracking, carryover scores, and melee transition.

Acceptance criteria: 650+ tests passing. The new test exercises at least 3 joust passes + melee entry.

title: Add gear item rarity-colored borders
description:
Polish agent flagged that gear item rarity borders need a JSX change (adding gear-item--${rarity} class to .gear-item divs in LoadoutScreen.tsx) before CSS rules can work. This is a LOW priority UI polish item.

For now: Write the CSS rules in App.css for .gear-item--uncommon through .gear-item--giga with appropriate border colors using existing --rarity-* CSS variables. The JSX change is deferred until a ui-dev agent is available.

Only edit src/App.css.
